div.p:
I have the honor of expressing my gratitude for your goodness in sending to this establishment two copies of Major Beddomes new work on Indian plants, fasc. 1.
Beddome (1868-74). See J. Moore to M. 30 December 1868.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be
